column2: Can your horse do it, or can't he? said the blustering man.
column3: Can your horse do it, or can't he? said the blustering man.

column2: I have no meadows to nurse sick horses in--he might get well or he might not; that sort of thing don't suit my business; my plan is to work 'em as long as they'll go, and then sell 'em for what they'll fetch, at the knacker's or elsewhere.
column3: I have no meadows to nurse sick horses in-he might get well or he might not; that sort of thing don't suit my business; my plan is to work 'em as long as they'll go, and then sell 'em for what they'll fetch, at the knacker's or elsewhere.
